alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Hunt; Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 9:04PM CDT until October 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hunt County in north central Texas... Western Hopkins County in north central Texas... Northern Rains County in north central Texas... Southwestern Delta County in north central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 904 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wolfe City to near Greenville City Lakes to near Caddo Mills, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Sulphur Springs, Commerce, Royse City, Cooper, West Tawakoni, Wolfe City, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, Emory, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Campbell, Cooper Lake, Greenville City Lakes, Big Creek Lake, Greenville Club Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, and Lake Sulphur Springs. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 79 and 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
